info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 4:41AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Pondera and south central Glacier Counties through 515 AM MDT... At 440 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of East Glacier Park Village, or 46 miles east of Evergreen, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Browning, East Glacier Park Village, South Browning, North Browning, East Glacier Park, Kiowa, Marias Pass and Starr School. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 198 and 229. Highway 89 between mile markers 1 and 17, and between mile markers 109 and 110. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
